ui.welcome to fake artist: A Fake Artist Goes to New York
ui.all fake artists tooltip: This variant can be introduced to make the Fake-Artist doubt himself, or just for laughs!
ui.play with the all fake-artists variant: All Fake Artists: There's a 10% chance everyone is a Fake-Artist. If this happens your only chance to win is if every player votes for himself.
ui.no fake-artist tooltip: This variant is meant to aid the Fake-Artist, but the real artists might suspect the first person who suggests there's no Fake-Artist, even if he is right!
ui.play with the no-fake-artist variant: No Fake Artist: There's a 10% chance there is NO Fake-Artist. if this happens you can only win if all players vote for no one (raise your finger in the air).
ui.play with the less first fake-artist var: Better Start: There's only a slim chance that the Fake-Artist is first.
ui.less first fake-artist tooltip: This variant makes it easier for the Fake-Artist to blend in. If the Fake-Artist is chosen to go first, he has a 90% chance to switch places with someone else.
ui.play with the confused artist variant: Confused Artist: One artist will get a different word from the same category, without knowing it.
ui.confused artist tooltip: This variant makes everyone less confident about their role. You might think you are the Fake-Artist, but you might be wrong!
ui.you are a confused artist: You are a Confused Artist (or are you the Fake-Artist?)
ui.invalid access code: Sorry, no game was found with the access code you provided!
ui.footer: Application based on the Spyfall meteor application:
ui.Author: Found a Bug? got a Suggestion? send me a PM on BGG:
ui.enter category: enter the category for the word
ui.let us choose: or let us choose it for you
